name: delete_chars_basic
description: CSI Ps P (Delete Characters) removes N characters at cursor, shifting remainder left
comment: Print ABCDE at (0,0)-(0,4). CUP(1,2) to (0,1). CSI 2 P deletes 2 chars at (0,1)-(0,2), shifting DE left. Grid becomes ADE__, cursor at (0,1). Print X overwrites D. Result: AXE.
